name: Lustra® Specialty Cleaner 280
description: Lustra® Specialty Cleaner 280 is an ultra-concentrated liquid component of alkaline cleaners for any type of car washes. Intended to use together with Ultraflex® Alkaline Bases, but can be used alone as a specialty cleaner in friction applications. Contains highly effective surfactants, solvents and pine oil for maximum cleaning of car surfaces. The product is optimized for quick penetration of road film and emulsification of oil components in the dirt on the car surface.
